extensionDescription.message: Multi-Account Containers ti permet di isolâ lis variis parts de tô vite in rêt in schedis diversis. Lis etichetis personalizadis e lis schedis cun codifiche colorade a judin a separâ lis ativitâts, come lis compris in rêt, la planificazion dai viaçs o il control de pueste eletroniche par lavôr.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Multi-Account Containers".

alwaysOpenSiteInContainer.message: Vierç simpri il sît in chest contignidôr

openNewTabInThisContainer.message: Vierç gnove schede in chest contignidôr

openTabs.description: Section title for tabs that are currently open in that container

onboarding-1-header.message: Un mût miôr par gjestî dutis lis tôs ativitâts in rêt

onboarding-1-description.message: Dopre i contignidôrs par organizâ lis ativitâts, gjestî i accounts e tignîti concentrât su ce che ti interesse.

onboarding-2-header.message: Fâs lavorâ i contignidôrs al to puest.

onboarding-2-description.message: Funzions come la codifiche a colôrs e lis schedis contignidôr separadis ti judin a cjatâ cun facilitât ce che ti covente, concentrâ la tô atenzion e ridusi al minim lis distrazions.

onboarding-3-header.message: Un puest par ogni robe e ogni robe al so puest.

onboarding-3-description.message: Scomence cui contignidôrs che o vin creât nô opûr cree un par to cont.

onboarding-4-header.message: Vierç simpri i sîts tai contignidôrs che tu vûs.

onboarding-4-description.message: Fâs clic cul boton diestri dal mouse dentri di une schede contignidôr par fâ in mût che il sît al vegni simpri viert tal contignidôr.

onboarding-5-header.message: Schedis contignidôr cuant che ti coventin.

onboarding-5-description.message: Frache a dilunc il boton Gnove schede par vierzi une gnove schede contignidôr.

onboarding-6-header.message: Cumò tu puedis sincronizâ i contignidôrs!

onboarding-6-description-2.message: Ative la sincronizazion par condividi i contignidôrs e i sîts associâts cun ducj i computers conetûts al to account.

onboarding-7-header-2.message: Al covente un account par sincronizâ.

onboarding-7-description-2.message: Fâs clic su Jentre par confermâ che il to account al è atîf.

onboarding-8-description.message: Cumò al è pussibil integrâ i contignidôrs cun Mozilla VPN o un proxy a tô sielte, creant une conession sigure e riservade par protezi lis tôs ativitâts in rêt.

spreadTheWord.message: Se ti plasin i contignidôrs, judinus a sparniçâ la vôs!

info.description: Alternative text for the i icon in the toolbar icon pop-up

openThisSiteConfirmation.message: Vierzi chest sît tal contignidôr assegnât?

wouldYouStillLikeToOpenConfirmation.message: Desideristu distès vierzi chest sît tal contignidôr corint?

rememberMyDecision.message: Visiti de mê decision par chest sît

onboardingToggle.message: Dopre cheste opzion par tornâ a viodi i panei de introduzion.

enableBookMarkMenusDescription.message: Cheste impostazion ti permet di vierzi un segnelibri o une cartele di segnelibris intun contignidôr.

enableSyncDescription.message: Cheste impostazion ti permet di sincronizâ su plui dispositîfs i tiei contignidôrs e i sîts associâts.

syncExcludeDescription.message: Esclût de sincronizazion i contignidôrs in base al lôr non doprant la espression regolâr specificade (cence distinzion tra maiusculis e minusculis).

replaceTab.message: Sostituìs schede invezit che creâ une gnove

replaceTabDescription.message: Se e ven vierte une pagjine assegnade a un altri contignidôr, sostituìs la schede corinte invezit di tignîle vierte. La viertidure des schedis cul boton centrâl dal mouse no ven tocjade di cheste opzion.

editWhichContainer.message: Modifiche cuâl contignidôr che al à di sei viert cuant che a vegnin dopradis lis scurtis numeradis.

keyboardShortCut.message: Contignidôr di vierzi cu la scurte di tastiere $keyId$

confirmNavigationTitle.description: This is the title of a confirmation page. Please do not translate "Multi-Account Containers".

openInNoContainer.description: This is the button text in confirmation page when we are not inside a container

youAskedFirefox.message: Tu âs domandât a Firefox di vierzi simpri il contignidôr $containerName$ par chest sît:

chooseLocation.description: Location refers to the geographical position used by the VPN

protectYourContainers.message: Protêç i tiei contignidôrs cun Mozilla VPN

protectThisContainer.message: Protêç chest contignidôr cun Mozilla VPN

useCustomLocation.message: Dopre une posizion personalizade par chest contignidôr

invalidProxyAlert.message: Inserìs un URL di proxy valit

mozillaVpnMustBeOn.message: Mozilla VPN e scugne jessi ative par doprâ cheste funzion.

proxyNowAvailable.message: Cumò cun Mozilla VPN e impostazions proxy avanzadis

tooltipWarning.message: Chest contignidôr al è configurât par doprâ un proxy Mozilla VPN, ma Mozilla VPN no je ative. Ative Mozilla VPN par doprâ chest contignidôr.

integratewithmozillavpn.message: Integre i tiei contignidôrs cun Mozilla VPN

mozillaVpnAndProxyPermissionsTitle.message: Mozilla VPN e permès pai proxy

nativeMessagingPermissionTitle.message: Permet ae estension di scambiâ i messaçs cun programs diviers di Firefox

nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.message: Cheste impostazion e permet ae estension di scambiâ messaçs cul client Mozilla VPN e e covente pal funzionament de integrazion cun Mozilla VPN.
nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.description: 'This setting' refers to the permission indicated in nativeMessagingPermissionTitle

proxyPermissionTitle.message: Permet ae estension di controlâ lis impostazions dal proxy

proxyPermissionDescription.message: Chest al permet di doprâ lis impostazions proxy avanzadis e ativâ la integrazion cun Mozilla VPN.
proxyPermissionDescription.description: 'This' refers to the permission indicated in proxyPermissionTitle

additionalPermissionNeeded.message: Cheste funzion e à bisugne di un permès in plui par funzionâ. Cuant che tu volarâs, al sarà pussibil disativâ i permès te pagjine des impostazions.
additionalPermissionNeeded.description: 'This feature' is the browser proxy permission. This string appears on the 'Advanced Proxy Settings' panel when the proxy permission is disabled.

mozillaVpnRequiresAdditionalPermissions.message: La integrazion cun Mozilla VPN e domande un abonament e permès in plui par funzionâ.

integrateContainers.message: Integre i tiei contignidôrs cun Mozilla VPN

theme.description: Theme section title in the option page

themeAuto.description: Default value for the theme option select tag

themeLight.description: Value for the theme option select tag

themeDark.description: Value for the theme option select tag

filterInputLabel.message: Filtre la liste dai contignidôrs par non:
filterInputLabel.description: Label for the filter input in the main panel. Only visible for screen reader.

imageAltContainerInfo.description: Alt text for right-arrow button to view container info

defaultContainerLabel.description: The title of the default container

openContainerPanel.description: Label for option in the keyboard shortcut manager (associating a shortcut to open the container panel)

containerShortcut.description: Label for option in the keyboard shortcut manager. $keyId$ is a number from 1 to 10.
